page.title: 03A Typical Saturday.
page.content: On Saturday I get up quite early at about 8.30a.m.I have my breakfast and watch the Saturday morning programmes. At about 10.30a.m. I walk into town to meet my friend Sarah.We have a look around town and have our dinner in MacDonald's.In town we like to have a go on the computers in Boots or John Menzies. We like to have a look in the clothes' shops, the make-up shops and the shoe shops. We both go home on the bus between 4.00 p.m. and 5.00 p.m. When I get home I have my tea watching television . Later on I wash the dishes for my mum and I practise my violin for 30 minutes. When it's time for Dynasty I watch it and later I watch Hill Street Blues.Then I go to bed.
